text: Hi everyone, is it possible to clone a drag and drop email to another portal? I need the saved sections in a different portal and it would be great if I do not have to rebuild those. Either through API or using the HubSpot UI.
Hey Teun, no thats not possible unfortunately
Thanks for the response <@U9KA594Q3>, manual job it is
<@UGDF9EBPW> maybe you could get away with viewing the html code of the template, depending on your scenario...?

<@U01D95STUS3> sadly it won't, we got a massive migration going on for both marketing and transactional emails. The marketing emails are setup in the production portal and the transactional emails are build in the dev portal, using custom code and custom modules. I need a few of the saved sections of a drag an drop email to create the right look and to test how they behave with custom tokens  send with the transactional email API. Guess I'll have to recreate those. 
But thank you for taking your time to respond.
migrations are almost always a pain in the a$$... :(
